channel.title: Comments on: Day 1 – Opening General Session

item.title: By: Myers
item.dc:creator: Myers
item.description: <p>shame on you, you need to swap to a windows machine then you would not lose any work</p>
item.content:encoded: shame on you, you need to swap to a windows machine then you would not lose any work

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>I thought you had problems with the 8.5 Mac client.<br/><br />I'm glad it was just a case of fat fingers.<br/><br /><br/><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
I thought you had problems with the 8.5 Mac client.

I’m glad it was just a case of fat fingers.

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />
